description:
BestPrice is now available for the Touchpad's larger screen!

The easy to use features that you've come to love on your phone have been completely rewritten, and there are some new calculators to make it easy to save you money!

+ BestPrice!
  - easy to use unit cost calculator for your inner scrooge.
  - easily convert different units to find true cost
  - displays how much you can save by choosing the cheapest item
+ Discount
  - Ever gone to the store and they had a tiered discount? 
    "save an additional 50% off the lowest discounted price?"
    now you can easily see how much it will really cost.
+ Dilution
  - Mix concentrated solutions easily with this applet.
  - Save money by buying concentrated weed-killers/cleaners and mix it yourself.
+ Fuel economy
  - Simple miles/kilometers per gallon/litre calculator

There are also a few calculators to help the kids with homework.

+ Quadratic Equation Solver
+ Pythagorean Solver
+ Temperature Conversion

If there are any other calculators you would like to see, please let me know & I will do my best to integrate it!
